Claim: "Two young soccer players compete for the ball."
Referring expressions: Two young soccer players, ball.  Two soccer players
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsYoung(a) and IsCompetingFor(a,b))) & (forall e (forall d (forall f (  IsCompetingFor(d,e) ->  IsCompeting(f))))) & (forall i (forall h (forall g ( IsCompeting(g) ->   IsCompetingFor(h,i)))))) -> (exists c (IsCompeting(c) and IsCompeting(c)))
